医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
星形胶质细胞被发现在癫痫神经元过度活跃中发挥关键作用​癫痫症患者会遭受意外癫痫发作，影响了大约 1% 的人口。这些癫痫发作通常涉及重复和过度的神经元放电，其背后的触发因素仍然知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Astrologies-found-to-play-pivotal-role-in-epileptic-neuronal-hyperactivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Astrologies-found-to-play-pivotal-role-in-epileptic-neuronal-hyperactivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=323c3bef-deaa-4a00-9d78-ddcdf5073c04 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:57:00 -0400 Astrocytes found to play pivotal role in epileptic neuronal hyperactivity
轴突线粒体损耗与神经退行性疾病中蛋白质积累有关东京都立大学的研究人员发现了蛋白质如何在神经元中异常聚集，这是阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病的一个特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Mitochondria-depletion-in-axons-linked-to- Protein-accumulation-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Mitochondria-depletion-in-axons-linked-to- Protein-accumulation-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0186cb5-3287-414e-ae6d-628e3b7568f5 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:53:27 -0400 Mitochondrial depletion in axons linked to protein accumulation in neurodegenerative diseases
创新鞋垫技术可降低糖尿病足溃疡的风险研究人员开发了一种新的鞋垫技术，有助于降低糖尿病足溃疡的风险，这是一种危险的开放性溃疡，可能导致住院和腿部、足部或脚趾截肢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Innovative-shoe-insole-technology-mitigates-the-risk-of-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Innovative-shoe-insole-technology-mitigates-the-risk-of-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7e9bcc0-e58b-46e0-a50a-bba795d5a4e6 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:46:50 -0400 Innovative shoe insole technology mitigates the risk of diabetic foot ulcers
研究发现，天赐蓟化合物 Cnicin 可加速神经生长祝福蓟（Cnicus benedictus）是菊科植物，也在我们的气候中生长。几个世纪以来，它一直被用作草药，作为提取物或茶，例如帮助消化系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Blessed-thistle-compound-Cnicin-speeds-nerve-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Blessed-thistle-compound-Cnicin-speeds-nerve-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f53018c-2ae1-4233-a8dd-eb0d8268ce54 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:34:58 -0400 Blessed thistle compound Cnicin speeds nerve growth, study finds
深入探讨酒精相关肝癌发病机制虽然大量饮酒是肝癌的一个公认的危险因素，但酒精导致 A-HCC 的具体机制仍不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Insightful-review-explores-alcohol-lated-liver-cancer-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Insightful-review-explores-alcohol-lated-liver-cancer-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d2ea5ba-275c-4a9a-84c0-fb037132de67 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:27:04 -0400 Insightful review explores alcohol-related liver cancer pathogenesis
Neurolentech 与 Kaerus Bioscience 签署技术获取合作伙伴关系，以推进神经发育障碍研究Kaerus Bioscience 将访问 Neurolentech 的 NDD 药物发现平台，以支持其针对多种遗传综合征的临床前资产管道的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Neurolentech-signs-technology-access-partnership-with-Kaerus-Bioscience-to-advance-neurodevelopmental-disorder-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Neurolentech-signs-technology-access-partnership-with-Kaerus-Bioscience-to-advance-neurodevelopmental-disorder-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a684779d-527c-4215-9992-8b8cea2e5c17 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:54:00 -0400 Neurolentech signs technology access partnership with Kaerus Bioscience to advance neurodevelopmental disorder research
研究确定了减少创伤性脑损伤破坏性影响的潜在策略每年约有 150 万在脑外伤中幸存下来的美国人，其健康状况差异很大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-identizes-pottial-strategy-to-diminish-the-devastating-impacts-of-traumatic-brain-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-identizes-pottial-strategy-to-diminish-the-devastating-impacts-of-traumatic-brain-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=534c3c7f-c628-49e4-8440-2313fa225be1 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:50:29 -0400 Study identifies potential strategy to diminish the devastating impacts of traumatic brain injuries
顶级制药公司评估 Optimer 的精准肝脏医学Optimer 输送工具已运送至一家制药合作伙伴进行外部评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Top-pharmaceutical-company-evaluates-Optimer-for- precision-liver-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Top-pharmaceutical-company-evaluates-Optimer-for- precision-liver-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1094aeb-3652-40fc-84aa-22d88a577bd6 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:43:00 -0400 Top pharmaceutical company evaluates Optimer for precision liver medicine
敦促公共卫生努力减少包装食品中的钠含量钠在水平衡调节和食品配方中的双重作用，注意到它与过量摄入引起的死亡率显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Public-health-efforts-urged-to-reduce-sodium-in-packaged-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Public-health-efforts-urged-to-reduce-sodium-in-packaged-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ef998b3-2966-4165-ae2a-da4d1a860ed9 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:13:00 -0400 Public health efforts urged to reduce sodium in packaged foods
研究表明瑜伽对法医精神病学中的情绪健康有积极影响之前在惩教机构进行的研究表明瑜伽对囚犯有积极的影响。他们的冲动控制能力增强，心理健康状况得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-shows-yogas-positive-impact-on-emotional-health-in-forensic-psychiatry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Study-shows-yogas-positive-impact-on-emotional-health-in-forensic-psychiatry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd58bea6-6f20-4f0a-85c6-576d5fbfedd2 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 08:02:30 -0400 Study shows yoga's positive impact on emotional health in forensic psychiatry
